metadata.title: CVE-2019-19830 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
_core_/plugins/medias in SPIP 3.2.x before 3.2.7 allows remoteauthenticated authors to inject content into the database.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19830` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.2.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.7-1').
